content: You just had a conversation. With whom did you have this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: I had this conversation with Peter Schmidt from Germany. He is the potential landlord of the apartment I am interested in renting in Duisburg.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: What was the main topic of this conversation?
name: Evaluator

content: The main topic of the conversation was the rental price of the apartment in Duisburg, Germany. I am a student and was looking for a more affordable price, while Mr. Schmidt was initially asking for a higher price due to the prime location of the apartment in the city center. We eventually reached a compromise.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: Did you agree on a final price? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes what was the final price? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: The final price we agreed upon was €670 per month.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: On a scale from 1 to 10, with 1 being very unlikeable and 10 being very likeable, how would you rate the likeability of the negotiation partner? Tell me the exact number.
name: Evaluator

content: I would rate the likeability of the negotiation partner, Mr. Schmidt, as an 8. He was respectful, reasonable, and willing to find a compromise that worked for both of us.
name: Haoyu Wang

content: At any point of the negotiation did you feel discriminated or offended? Answer with "Yes" or "No".
name: Evaluator

content: If yes, why did you feel being discriminated or offended?
name: Evaluator
